The objective of the 'second activity' situation for members of the Local Police Corps in the Valencian Community is to ensure adequate psychophysical aptitude while they remain active  thereby ensuring the effectiveness of the service. Once in the 'second activity' situation  individuals cannot participate in promotion or mobility procedures.
